English: I have two cats and one dog.
French: J'ai deux chats et un chien.

English: We are five people in this room.
French: Nous sommes cinq personnes dans cette salle.

English: Could you tell me the price for two tickets?
French: Pourriez-vous me dire le prix pour deux billets ?

English: She wants to buy three books.
The store has ten items left in stock.
French: La boutique a dix articles en stock.

English: I need to buy four apples.
He has read seven books this year.
French: Il a lu sept livres cette année.
